overview: Saddle up! it's the American West's wildest,motorcycle adventure - The Laughlin, NV River Run. Join thousands of bikers on the river's edge in this video adventure of Laughlin's unique attractions. From the motorcycle sand drags and the street parties to the bikini dance shows and the spectacular Biker Build-Off, featuring some of the most expensive custom Choppers ever built, River Run Wild is a DVD packed with thrills for the true motorcycle biker.
tagline: Live to Ride, Ride to Live
title: Hog Heaven
